<starsuncloud@...> wrote:
> Well dang, you all might enjoy the Imagination Tribe list. It's not

> but rather a creativity list. It's designed to nurture your creative
> self, whether you're living the creative life or feeling repressed.:)
> We just finished an ATC trade, are working on ABC books and talking
> about other projects, including another ATC trade.
> http://groups.yahoo.com/group/imaginationtribe/
> Ren

messages.subject: Hi! from a newbie
messages.msgSnippet: Welcome Paige! They work on their altered books a lot, and their scrapbooks, and we just recently discovered Art Trading Cards, which they have been enjoying
messages.messageBody:
Welcome Paige!

"They work on their altered books a lot, and their
scrapbooks, and we just recently discovered Art Trading Cards, which
they have been enjoying doing. "

Well dang, you all might enjoy the Imagination Tribe list. It's not
specifically an unschooling list (though lotsa unschoolers are there)
but rather a creativity list. It's designed to nurture your creative
self, whether you're living the creative life or feeling repressed.:)

We just finished an ATC trade, are working on ABC books and talking
about other projects, including another ATC trade.

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/imaginationtribe/

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
